titleStmt.title: To the supream authority in this Common-wealth, the Parliament of England. The petition of John Earl of Rutland
titleStmt.author: Rutland, John Manners, Earl of, 1604-1679.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Concerns compensation to Rutland for Belvoir Castle, pulled down by the government, and his dispute with Edward Howard, Baron Howard of Escrick, about the lease of Wallingford House.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
